resources.string: Design For \nInflexionpoint Technologies\n by Rakibul Ahasan
You can discover a wide range of recipes from different cuisines and for various dietary preferences.
Recipe apps often come with features like cooking timers and step-by-step instructions, making the cooking process smoother and more efficient.
You can find recipes tailored to specific dietary needs, helping you make healthier food choices.

" - 2 ripe avocados"

 "- 1/2 red onion, minced (about 1/2 cup)"

 "- 1-2 serrano chiles, stems and seeds removed, minced"

 "- 2 tablespoons cilantro (leaves and tender stems), finely chopped"

 - 1 tablespoon of fresh lime or lemon juice,

 - 1/2 teaspoon coarse salt,

 - A dash of freshly grated black pepper,

 - 1/2 ripe tomato, seeds and pulp removed, chopped"
